about.me: I'm a SSE for a Fortune 30 Company contributing my skills and passion to see Cardano become the #1 Global Blockchain. Also, I have a toddler and newborn that are going to require a college fund ;)
about.server: Each node and relay have 2 vCPUs, 16 GB memory, fault tolerant redundancy, hourly uptime checks, daily snapshots and DR playbooks. Processing, Storage and Memory can be instantly incremented as needed.
